content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: bowl
inventory=[{"type": "shulker_shell", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "warped_fungus", "quantity": 36, "index": 13}, {"type": "acacia_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "podzol", "quantity": 9, "index": 16}, {"type": "smooth_quartz_stairs", "quantity": 19, "index": 19}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 51, "index": 20}, {"type": "cauldron", "quantity": 41, "index": 24}, {"type": "brown_dye", "quantity": 15, "index": 27}, {"type": "crimson_button", "quantity": 52, "index": 28}, {"type": "glass_pane", "quantity": 62, "index": 30}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 42, "index": 31}, {"type": "snow_block", "quantity": 57, "index": 32}, {"type": "spawner", "quantity": 23, "index": 33}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "netherite_block", "quantity": 17, "index": 40}, {"type": "infested_mossy_stone_bricks", "quantity": 7, "index": 41}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 31, "index": 44}, {"type": "dark_oak_log", "quantity": 34, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a bowl, I need to first craft acacia planks, which requires placing one acacia log into the crafting grid. I will place the acacia log from slot 45 into slot 1 of the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4

Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1
